Package de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DrawableAnimation.AnimationListener
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified about a drawable animation's progress, must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundAnimation
    An abstract base class for all animations, which can be used to change backgrounds.
    BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder<AnimationType extends BackgroundAnimation,BuilderType extends BackgroundAnimation.AbstractBackgroundAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,?>>
    An abstract base class for all builders, which allow to create animations, which can be used to change backgrounds.
    CircleRevealAnimation
    An animation, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size as a clipping circle.
    CircleRevealAnimation.Builder
    A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size as a clipping circle.
    CircleTransitionAnimation
    An animation, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.
    CircleTransitionAnimation.Builder
    A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change backgrounds by animating the new background as a circle, which grows from a specific position.
    CrossFadeTransitionAnimation
    An animation, which can be used to change backgrounds via cross-fading.
    CrossFadeTransitionAnimation.Builder
    A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change backgrounds via cross-fading.
    DialogAnimation
    An abstract base class for all animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog.
    DialogAnimation.AbstractDialogAnimationBuilder<AnimationType extends DialogAnimation,BuilderType extends DialogAnimation.AbstractDialogAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,?>>
    An abstract base class for all builders, which allow to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog.
    DrawableAnimation
    An abstract base class for all animations, which can be used to change drawables.
    DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType extends DrawableAnimation,BuilderType extends DrawableAnimation.AbstractDrawableAnimationBuilder<AnimationType,?>>
    An abstract base class for all builders, which allow to create animations, which can be used to change drawables.
    RectangleRevealAnimation
    An animation, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size.
    RectangleRevealAnimation.Builder
    A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size.
    ScaleTransitionAnimation
    An abstract base class for all animations, which can be used to change drawables using a resize animation.
    ScaleTransitionAnimation.Builder
    A builders, which allows to create animations, which can be used to change drawables using a resize animation.
